name: sonar-display-system
description: Military-Grade Submarine Sonar Console Simulation - Pure HTML5, CSS3, Canvas API

scripts.test-audio: echo 'Check console while page is open to verify audio configuration'
scripts.build: echo 'This is a static HTML/CSS/JS project - no build required'
scripts.start: python -m http.server 8000 && echo 'Open http://localhost:8000 in your browser'

author: Submarine Sonar System Project

notes.audio-setup: Place your sonar_ping.mp3 file in the audio/ directory. The system will automatically play it every second.
notes.browser: Works in all modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
notes.offline: This app works completely offline - no external dependencies or network calls required
notes.server: For local testing, run: python -m http.server 8000
notes.deployment: Copy entire sonar_display/ folder to your web server - it's a static site
